div.pre: 2377 Entremont (anc. oppidum of the Sal- luvii), near Aix, 1946 Burial: 123 B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 1434 AR. Massalia: ob. (some with letters on cheek) Disposition: Aix Benoit, Gallia 1947, pp. 83-4 â€ Rolland, RN 1959-60, pp. 37-51 illus. (1133 examined)
